newsitem.title: USA: Logicon wins $19.4 mln U.S. Navy contract.
newsitem.headline: Logicon wins $19.4 mln U.S. Navy contract.

text.p: Logicon Inc said on Monday that it was awarded a two-year contract valued at $19.4 million from the U.S. Navy Center for Tactical Systems Interoperability.

In a statement, Logicon said it would provide a broad range of systems engineering, analysis and technical support related to the interoperability and standardization of command, control, communications, computer and intelligence systems. The work is in conjunction with current and future test systems, subsystems and related equipment used by the center in its fleet support mission.
